namelist.namelist_summary:
############################################################################### namelist_lauer17rse.xml (testing namelist)
Description Namelist for creating the 20 figures from Lauer et al. (2017) using the ESA CCI data sets for sea surface temperature, sea ice, cloud, soil moisture, land cover, aerosol, ozone, and greenhouse gases (CO2).
Authors Axel Lauer (DLR, Germany - axel.lauerfrank@dlr.de) Alexander Loew (LMU, Germany - alexander.loew@lmu.de) Benjamin Mueller (LMU, Germany - b.mueller@iggf.geo.uni-muenchen.de) Mattia Righi (DLR, Germany - mattia.righi@dlr.de) Daniel Senftleben (DLR, Germany - daniel.senftleben@dlr.de) Sabrina Wenzel (DLR, Germany - sabrina.wenzel@dlr.de) Ulrika Willen (SMHI, Sweden - ulrika.willen@dmhi.se)
Project ESA CMUG
Reference Lauer et al., Remote Sensing of Environment (2017)
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ###############################################################################

diag.description: AEROSOL OPTICAL DEPTH 550 nm: grading precalculations (only models with interactive aerosols)
TOTAL COLUMN OZONE: grading precalculations (only models with interactive chemistry)
COLLECT AND PLOT PREVIOUSLY CALCULATED GRADINGS (Portrait diagram)
Preprocessing for observational uncertainties of XCO2
Taylor diagram for column-averaged atmospheric CO2 (XCO2)
Preprocessing of observational uncertainties of soil moisture
Taylor diagram for total cloud cover (clt)
Preprocessing of observational uncertainties of total column ozone
Taylor diagram for total column ozone (toz)
Taylor diagram for 2m temperature (creates common legend)
Aerosol optical depth 550 nm (only models with interactive aerosols)
Absorption optical depth 550 nm (only models with interactive aerosols)
Fine mode optical depth 550 nm (only models with interactive aerosols)
vertical profiles of zonal mean ozone
a) total column ozone annual cycle (comparison with ESA CCI)
line plot of column-averaged atmospheric co2
